17
18#include "QRAlignmentPattern.h"
19
20#include <cmath>
21
22namespace ZXing {
23namespace QRCode {
24
25AlignmentPattern::AlignmentPattern(float posX, float posY, float estimatedModuleSize) :
26 ResultPoint(posX, posY),
27 _estimatedModuleSize(estimatedModuleSize)
28{
29}
30
31bool
32AlignmentPattern::aboutEquals(float moduleSize, float i, float j) const
33{
34 if (std::abs(i - y()) <= moduleSize && std::abs(j - x()) <= moduleSize) {
35 float moduleSizeDiff = std::abs(moduleSize - _estimatedModuleSize);
36 return moduleSizeDiff <= 1.0f || moduleSizeDiff <= _estimatedModuleSize;
37 }
38 return false;
39}
40
41/**
42* Combines this object's current estimate of a finder pattern position and module size
43* with a new estimate. It returns a new {@code FinderPattern} containing an average of the two.
44*/
45AlignmentPattern
46AlignmentPattern::combineEstimate(float i, float j, float newModuleSize) const {
47 float combinedX = (x() + j) / 2.0f;
48 float combinedY = (y() + i) / 2.0f;
49 float combinedModuleSize = (_estimatedModuleSize + newModuleSize) / 2.0f;
50 return {combinedX, combinedY, combinedModuleSize};
51}
52
53} // QRCode
54} // ZXing
55
